title: Contemporary Chief Set (Three Miniatures)
artistDisplayName:
Barbara Teller Ornelas (born to the Water’s Edge Clan, Tábąąhá, born for the Water-Flows-Together Clan, Tó’aheedlíinii; Maternal grandfather born for Red Bottom People, Tł’ááshchí’í; paternal grandfather One-Walks-Around Clan, Honágháahnii);
Diné, born 1954
medium: Wool; dovetail tapestry weave; extended selvage cord fringe. Warp: hand carded wool and mohair; weft: commercially processed, aniline dyed merino wool, respun by the artist; approximately 14 warps/inch and 112 wefts/inch.
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Don F. and Jean F. Stuck Endowment Fund
